name: World War 2016 Future Air Battle Pro
name_original: World War 2016 Future Air Battle Pro
description:
Future Battle it out in the skies for total air control! Fly a fighter jet against the best in the world, shoot down enemy jets and defend the nation for freedom! One the best Flight Simulator and jet fighter combination. Get ready for yor next Air Combat

Game Features:
- Super Realistic 3D graphics with cockpit and controls!
- Superb battlefields and air combat!
- Gunship ,Missiles, bombs, machine guns and many more!

World War 2016 Air Battle is a realistic war simulation. Fly your Air Fighter plane through a storm of missiles and bullets into the war zone! Strike your enemies out on the sky! The world needs its best pilots! Good luck to the captain!
One star ship level is included as well

Controls:
- Tilt to control
- Neutral position 45 degrees facing up
- Best played seated or standing

DOWNLOAD AND FLY YOUR PLANE TODAY!
